attributes.review:
Nothing but vanity and nonsense in this annoying app. If you heard of the Central Park Five, Trump wanted five black children to die because they were black.

Satan has tricked you so well that he knows he can put everything blaming your face and you’re so blind you can’t even see it!
attributes.title: Ultimately dissapointed.

attributes.review: This app took forever to download!! Once it was downloaded every time i tried to open it, it would immediately shut down! What a terrible glitch, because of this i will not be voting for trump and i encourage others to not as well!
attributes.title: Terrible app!!

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to get updated on the latest news of our dear president donald and i was very disappointed to find that this app is nothing but a bunch of BUGS! it’s so laggy and it even kicks me off of the app occasionally. i do NOT recommend this app.
attributes.title: worst app on the appstore

attributes.review: This app this absolutely disgusting. Every time I click on it, it takes me straight to ph!! As a minor trying too use this app to support trump, I feel like he should make this app more pg!! Also this app is very glitching and it’s really bad. Stick too sexualizing young woman trump! Thank you and goodbye.
attributes.title: horrible app guys😡

attributes.review: I got this app to learn more about my good ole orange president but it glitches out so bad doesn’t even let me come to one of those stupid rally’s I don’t understand why someone would make such a awful app its so poorly developed I deleted it after one hour of having it
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: Horrible. It’s a no from me. This app should go back to where it came from, probably Mexico or china. This app never loaded. I tried and I tried to speed the process up, but it deleted itself. I took it as a sign from the universe that this app is evil incarnate.
attributes.title: This app needs to go😭

attributes.review: I was so excited to get my package from Trump! It took WEEKS for it to get here!!! When I finally got the package I saw that there were no instructions 👎🏿. The box was in poor shape and there were bees. The bees were ATTRACTED TO THE BOX! Idk what you put in there but 👀 the bees were ruthless and killed my brother. One star.
attributes.title: I was super excited.

attributes.review: This app is so poorly created and sooooo slow to use. Also, just looking at it makes me feel sick and I can’t stand using it anymore because I start vomiting when I look at it. HORRIBLE APP! Do not use unless you want to start vomiting and feeling horrible! 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻🤢🤢🤮🤮
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: Wheni first opened this I went out of full control of my phone and was being hacked then they asked me for personal information
attributes.title: App is stealing info

attributes.review: People👥love❤️that🤡I👩 hate 👹 myself👩 I 🧚‍♀️ climbed🧗out🌸of 🦗my 👁 head🧠 and 👄 watched 💕myself 🤡implode 🏊‍♂️a💫thought😷without🧜‍♀️a🦟body🧍‍♀️ought 💞to✨be🌸a👅shot🔫to❤️take🧚‍♀️a🦿load🧞‍♀️off❌my🤰brain 🧠is💕poisoned🤢&🦗I’m 👄searching 🙇‍♀️for 🎃the💩 antidote 🔮but 🦟 everytime🧚‍♀️i👩find 😻it🤡my ✨ defense 💞 scream 😱 oh 👄no ❤️ you 👨 don’t 👀 wOaH
attributes.title: A terrible man running a terrible app ❤️
